name: Computer R-3
overview: A strategy game of Xs and Os. The player tries to fence in the opponent's pieces with his or her own pieces, one at a time-vertically, horizontally or diagnolly. If their opponet's pieces cannot be fenced in, the player must pass. If the player fences in the opponent's pieces, they will become the player's pieces. The one who has the most pieces on the board after the game is finished is the winner.
